text: Manuel da Costa (19 June 1946 - 19 August 2014) was a Portuguese equestrian. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Portuguese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Portugal Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon
title: Manuel da Costa (equestrian)
